column2: "Huh? All of the enemies... disappeared? That means we must've won! Alright!"
"Then, why... Why do I feel so anxious..."
"...Aru?! Your outfit... No wait, what are you doing here...?!"

"I heard a voice... It was calling to you.
<%me>'s voice."

"...Aru, what do we do? How can we help
<%me>?"
"Take my hands... I can show you the way."
"They've saved us more times than I can count..."
"Now it's my turn to save them!"
